forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Thunder possible. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Thunder possible. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers around this evening. Clearing skies later. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers around this evening. Clearing skies later. Low 22F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early then becoming mostly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning followed by mostly cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to some clearing overnight. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to some clearing overnight. Low 29F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 28F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
